channel.title: Help with errors loading client and compiling!
channel.description: Hi, I'm new to the community, so hello guys, and excuse me for asking newbie questions because again, I am new. :P Anyways, I want to build on a private server (InsidiaX) And I have downloaded a source, cache and client for it on the MoparScape forums. However, when I run the compiler I get this error[code]Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]. So I have no idea what that means, and I have the latest version of JDK (1.7.0.7). Anyways, After that I double click the "Run" file which I guess runs the client. Problem is, when I run the batch file I get this error[code]InsidiaX is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\insidiaXV8cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:111) at client.startUp(client.java:9047) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4766) at client.startUp(client.java:9057) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]Now again, I have no idea what that means, and I've spent hours searching over the forums and internet to fund a solution, but no luck. I've seen someone suggest to change the "maplocation.txt" to "mapconfig.txt" which I already did, and yes it is in the Maps folder. My question is this: how do I fix both errors? And, after I fix the errors, what do I do then? Any thoughts are very appreciated, just don't flame or troll please, and it'd be better if you put it so that it's simple to understand. :P :)[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,512994.520.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,512994.520.html[/url]<----- The InsidiaX download section

item.title: Help with errors loading client and compiling!
item.dc:creator: @RyRyscape RyRyscape
item.description:
@RyRyscape wrote:

Wrong section. Post in server help! The one on the top means the compiling was successful. The bottom one is because I think the cache is fucked up. Don’t use InsidiaX. It just sucks anyways.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with errors loading client and compiling!

item.title: Help with errors loading client and compiling!
item.dc:creator: @andyfang andyfang
item.description:
@andyfang wrote:

Hi, I’m new to the community, so hello guys, and excuse me for asking newbie questions because again, I am new. Anyways, I want to build on a private server (InsidiaX) And I have downloaded a source, cache and client for it on the MoparScape forums. However, when I run the compiler I get this errorNote: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Press any key to continue . . .. So I have no idea what that means, and I have the latest version of JDK (1.7.0.7). Anyways, After that I double click the “Run” file which I guess runs the client. Problem is, when I run the batch file I get this errorInsidiaX is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\insidiaXV8cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:111) at client.startUp(client.java:9047) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4766) at client.startUp(client.java:9057) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Now again, I have no idea what that means, and I’ve spent hours searching over the forums and internet to fund a solution, but no luck. I’ve seen someone suggest to change the “maplocation.txt” to “mapconfig.txt” which I already did, and yes it is in the Maps folder. My question is this: how do I fix both errors? And, after I fix the errors, what do I do then? Any thoughts are very appreciated, just don’t flame or troll please, and it’d be better if you put it so that it’s simple to understand. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,512994.520.html<----- The InsidiaX download section
